description:
These are a few smaller Linux content creators that I want to give a shout out to. These folks are putting out quality videos, and I think most of you guys will find their content informative and entertaining.

0:00 Intro
1:17 https://www.youtube.com/@BreadOnPenguins
3:19 https://www.youtube.com/@LinuxCreativeProject
4:56 https://www.youtube.com/@LinuxRenaissance
6:26 https://www.youtube.com/@TheLinuxWayToday
7:37 https://www.youtube.com/@linuxnext
8:45 https://www.youtube.com/@ProfessorLinux
10:00 https://www.youtube.com/@linuxhub70

title: Linux YouTubers I'm Watching In 2024
